title: Issue with board sorting
body: While trying to look through boards clicking to filter vy hot see,s to filter by most recent and most recent seems to filter by hot u less i am mistakien

replies.body:
I think I see what the confusion is here.

+ Sort by **Best** = The most popular posts of all time


+ Sort by **Hot** = The most popular posts today (but since we have lower traffic than most servers it ends up being popular posts in the last 1 - 4 days for us)


+ Sort by **New** = The newest posts submitted regardless of popularity


+ Sort by **Recent** = Posts with recent activity (e.g new comment on a post)

Lemme know if that helps :D
ah that makes more sense thank you
